title: Font ID : The Hitchhiker's Guide
content:
Been looking for this font for weeks now. It's the font used for the Guide in the Hitchhiker's Guide 2005 movie.

I've came across some similar fonts, but none that had a similar Capital 'H' or 'G'.

Thanks !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [trythis.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111016053756/http:/typophile.com/files/trythis.jpg) | 56.71 KB |
author: frankov

comments.content: if a font, i doubt it ever made the transition to the digital realm.

I'm still waiting and hoping :)

If you're right, and it was never produced as a font, I'm going to entirely retrace it.

Thanks for your answer, Paul !
